title: RagingPixels - Modeling Murcielago Uncut - Needs Techsmith Camta
description:
maxon cinema 4d r10 ragingpixels camtasia lamborghini murcielago poly modeling p2p point to point long hypernurbs 

tutorial car 3d resource 


THIS IS AN UNCUT VIDEO MEANING YOU GET ALL THE ERRORS AN CURSING THAT COMES WITH THE USUAL VIDEO BLOGS....oh and my bathroom break.

This is a video that I made to all my well fans I guess you can say, or just people who want to know how I go about making my 3d car models. its recorded in camtasia and hasnt been formatted to any other format yet, so its an
avi that requires the techsmith camtasia video codec to view, which can be obtained from their website, just goto google techsmith and you\&#039;ll get their page.
Aside from that, I used the program called Cinema 4d r10 to make it, for those whom don\&#039;t have the program yet,
goto maxon\&#039;s site to download the demo...or since we are here, warez it, but I don\&#039;t condone it, but its going to happen anyway, so why not support it. If you like the app, please buy it, its a bit much, but it goes a long way. audio goes off sync after about 30 minutes and the last 12 minutes or so is nothing but audio as my computer froze
up when it was compiling the video file.
This video is newbie friendly, as well as pirator friendly. anyway if you like it, please if you can, help me by possibly donating to my cause with paypal to <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="96f2fcc9f9e0f3e4faf7efd6eff7fef9f9b8f5f9fb">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

Everything in the video is my usual workflow and only people that saw it before were close friend and clients. enjoy guys.

-anthony v

if possible, if anyone is able to host the file somewhere for me, please email me with the email above to give me the link ok? thanks.
